A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Halfway through this movie I had no idea what to think. It felt awkward at times and slightly “off” for a Star Wars movie and there were even moments that reminded me of the queasy sensation I had watching the dreaded prequels. BUT by the end I was enthralled and the more I think about this film\, the more I love it. I may need a second viewing to really come to terms with this new vision but anything this new and creative takes some getting used to. While “Force Awakens” was too safe and a predictable rehash of “A New Hope”\, this movie has no real precedent and I hope that the upcoming Star Wars films continue to surprise and challenge.
